name: Snake Farmer
description:
The Santa Fe Snake Trainer's Guild is the most prestigious and exclusive snake training league in the country.
Joining is all you've ever wanted.
The only problem is... you don't even have a single snake!

Now, high quality snakes are expensive, but you have a plan. By planting tasty crops, you can make the snakes come to you.

-Buy seeds from the Market.
-Plant crops and wait for them to grow.
-Harvest the crops and sell them at the Market, or wait and see if a snake shows up.
-Catch that snake!
-Enter your snakes into snake shows to try to get the best score of all time.

CONTROLS
wasd to move

space to interact

1,2,3,4,5 to select a crop to plant

You can see your snakes by walking into your front door.
More expensive plants attract rarer snakes.
Different judges like different kinds of snakes.
